entry.title: Your Emergency Contact Has Experienced An Emergency
entry.summary:
Author: LuthienLuinwe

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,495Chapters: 12/?Kudos: 197

entry.title: Forget it Ever Happened
entry.summary:
Author: Pneumatic

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 43,983Chapters: 7/7Kudos: 568

Summary: Hal has absolutely no problems with people knowing he’s dating Bruce, but if he could live out the rest of his days without anyone finding out what happened on Anaxia, then he’d consider it a life well lived. Unfortunately, the universe has a sense of humour, and now it looks like certain…events are coming to light.Funny how things work out.

entry.title: Whispers through the grapevine
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,810Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 7

Summary: There were whispers in the court, among the maids, and among the soldiers alike that the second Prince had a secret lover. Their kind, brave, and lovable prince had been seduced by a harlot who would visit the Prince's chamber every night and leave by sunrise, unheard and unseen.But Bruce knew, and he knew more than he needed to be. There had not been a single whisper that could escape his ear and the truth always followed not so far behind.Clark had entangled himself in a trivial love affair with his loyal soldier, the Emerald Knight, Hal Jordan. Someone important enough for Bruce, the true First Prince of El, to remember yet insignificant enough for him not to bat an eye. A nobody who would play a role as his half-brother's first heartbreak, a mere pebble on Kal-El's road to maturity, and the first brush strokes that would be layered with many more in Kal-El's canvas of life.That was what Bruce had thought.But it seemed like the Emerald Knight had a knack for proving him wrong.

entry.title: When Will is Overruled by Fate
entry.summary:
Author: kcft

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,294Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 270

Summary: “Alright, where should I drop you off, Mr..?”“Jordan, Hal Jordan. I’m uh, staying at the Queen manor,”“..Oliver Queen? Are you his cousin?”“I’m staying at his place for a bit. He’s basically my brother,” Hal chuckled.…“You know how to swim, right?” The angel asked and batted his eyelashes at Hal.“Hm? Oh, yes, I’m a very good swimmer,”Next thing he knew, Hal was shoved off the dock and back into the lake again.OrHal moves in with Oliver after his divorce with Carol. Unbeknownst to him, Oliver had a rivalry with one of the other rich men of Gotham. Hal gets caught up between the two families. The Queen’s and the Wayne’s.

entry.title: To cage a star
entry.summary:
Author: rie_rotisse

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 45,957Chapters: 19/?Kudos: 509

Summary: "Excuse me, um... I need to find someone, would you- would you mind helping me?"The lady who is asked is an old woman at a bus stop, with a warm expression on her face."Yes, dear, who are you looking for?""Um..." The little girl in the pale green dress reaches for her small purse and pulls out a carefully kept piece of paper to give the old lady. "His name is written on the back...""And who may this person be to you, dear?""My dad... Mom said Mr. Bruce Wayne is my dad."

entry.title: his favorite blue
entry.summary:
Author: noblecaste

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,166Chapters: 3/3Kudos: 113

Summary: It’s hard, traveling through space and not being able to tell when the void stops and becomes full. Missions out in space are learning experiences, a new perspective on his own world and the others. That’s why he loves when, for whatever reason, they stop.They stop and they can see everything. The bright and dull, the colorful and the monochrome.And Hal loves it.Absolutely adores it.That’s why, when he’s stripped from that sea of colors, his life stops.

entry.title: Slip of the tongue
entry.summary:
Author: BitterHibiscus

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,920Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 91

Summary: Hal wasn't on Earthside when it happened.She had been called to help with cleanup after a particularly nasty mission — a job usually denoted to the Lanterns that had caused the destruction themselves, but since Earth had so many more of them than normal, she found herself volunteering for assists if she knew John or Baz or Jessica would be within or close to sector 2814.Which is why she unfortunately does not get to see the absolute media crashout that happens after Bruce Wayne accidentally reveals he's been happily married for over two years.
